product_name: CliniqueClinique For Men Anti-Aging Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid
summary: SummaryClinique For Men Anti-Aging Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid is an all-day hydrator that combats lines, wrinkles, and dullness for a younger, revitalized look.
details: DetailsBenefitsAll Skin TypesHydrating moisturizer with antioxidantsSoothes, brightens, and plumps eye-area skinPlumps skin with hydration that helps make fine, dry lines less noticeableDermatologist and ophthalmologist testedNon-acnegenicAllergy testedKey IngredientsHyaluronic AcidGlycerinFormulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesOilFragranceItem 2271618How To UseUse moisturizer twice a day, morning and night. Smooth over clean face and neck, avoiding eye areaIngredientsWater\Aqua\Eau, Squalane, Glycerin, Isostearyl Neopentanoate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Oil, Butylene Glycol, Peg-100 Stearate, Cetyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Polyethylene, Glyceryl Stearate, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Hordeum Vulgare (Barley) Extract\Extrait D'Orge, Sigesbeckia Orientalis (St. Paul'S Wort) Extract, Whey Protein\Lactis Protein\Proteine Du Petit-Lait, Caffeine, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Sucrose, Petrolatum, Sodium Polyacrylate, Acetyl Glucosamine, Caprylyl Glycol, Propylene Glycol Dicaprate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Extract, Glyceryl Polymethacrylate, Palmitoyl Hexapeptide-12, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Dimethicone Crosspolymer-3, Hexylene Glycol, Peg-8, Xanthan Gum, Disodium Edta, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use moisturizer twice a day, morning and night. Smooth over clean face and neck, avoiding eye area

reviews.headline: After 1 month of use
reviews.comments: I have acne scars and I use this product with their face scrub too. I use both only at night because I just started it. After the 3 Rd week or so I started to notice that most of my scars are about 50% gone ( I am 25 yo). Best stuff I've ever bought. Also bought their shaving cream which might also help. I hope this review helps

reviews.headline: Husband loves this!
reviews.comments: My husband loves this!  He used to exclusively use Pevonia Moisturizer until it was discontinued. He was convinced nothing else would work. Being a huge Clinique fan, I took a chance and ordered this!  Thank goodness he loves it.  Can never go wrong with Clinique

reviews.headline: Purchased for my husband
reviews.comments: I purchased this for my husband, so I have not used the product BUT he has and he likes it. He has oily acne prone skin and is wanting to address the beginning signs of some super fine looking wrinkles. He has used this product for several months, after purchasing the travel size, and said he will continue to. There is no offensive odor and the it absorbs well.

reviews.headline: A GOOD start, but watch the eye area.
reviews.comments:
Just decided to give Clinique Men's Anti-againg face lotion a try, since my face has been dry during the winter  months and from using Proactiv plus. My three stars are for - it has only been a week and it burns my eyes. So far, these past few days from using, my skin HAS BEEN more hydrated and smooth/soft - after a month of daily evening use, I should see more result. 

I chose to use this lotion ONLY in the evening since it burns my eyes, making them red and watery. So I stopped applying around my eye area and use an eye cream instead. I'm not much of an eye cream type of guy, so I go with my standard Neutrogena Naturals - zero eye burning, for me.

reviews.headline: I will buy this product again
reviews.comments: Not greasy, use daily. Disappointed that it doesn't have any sunblock protection.

reviews.headline: I have used this product for several years.
reviews.comments: I have used this for several years.

reviews.headline: Clinique for Men review - great product
Husband Loves!
reviews.comments: My husband loves all of the Clinique men's line.

reviews.headline: My husband loves this product
reviews.comments: My husband it so cute about using this - this is his first foray into male beauty products. He actually said he has noticed an improvement in his skin - less dry and smother looking. I convinced him to use it when Joe Bidden said that was why his skin looked and felt so good :)

reviews.headline: Hoped for better
reviews.comments: Really wanted to like this based on so many reviews I had read across multiple sites, however it just didn't work out.  It did moisturize very well, however after awhile my forehead seemed greasy, which eventually turned into small batches of acne.  I went off of it for awhile and back to my Clinique for men Maximum Hydrator and my skin cleared up.  Back to the anti-age and boom acne again, so I exchanged for another maximum hydrator.  Based on the ingredients its a good option for anti-age, aside from the fact there isn't an SPF.  However it wasn't for me.

reviews.headline: Great mositure with no shine
reviews.comments: I enjoy this product, as I like to take care of my skin but don't want to smell like flowers and herbs.  This has no odor at all and does a decent job moisteriizing with no odor.

reviews.headline: Always a Trustfull Product
reviews.comments: Never can go wrong with Clinique products, notice some changes in my skin since using for about two weeks.(facial) I spend alot of time outside and like me skin to look good.

reviews.headline: Great Product!
reviews.comments: Overall my husband loves this product! I have seen a big difference In his skin it's not dry and dehydrated anymore!

faceoff_positive.comments: I started using Clinique's Men's line about 4 years ago when I was 26. I had always taken good care of my skin before that, using drug store brand moisturizers on my face. However I started to develop circles under my eyes, so I started using Clinique products to try to combat them. The previous creams reduced the circles a little bit and have prevented them from getting worse over the last few years. When Clinique reformulated their products I was a bit skeptical. However, I was pleased by two things. First, you get twice as much product for the same price, and second, this new product has all but made the circles under my eyes disappear! And in only about a month! I felt the difference the first night I used it. This new cream caused a noticeably tighter sensation than the previous one. With the old line I used to use the anti-aging cream only at night and would use the anti-aging SPF 15 moisturizer in the morning. With the bigger bottles I now use the anti-aging cream morning and night and use the new SPF 21 moisturizer daily. Separating the anti-aging function from the sunscreen function simplifies application and gives you more flexibility to tailor the regimen to your needs. If you're currently using drug store brands and are concerned about the price, don't worry. The bottles are bigger now and you only need a pea sized amount to cover your face. I buy new product on average about every 6 months!
faceoff_positive.headline: It REALLY works!

faceoff_negative.comments:
Clinique used to offer 'age defense hydrator'. It was expensive for what it was, but I could afford it and liked the way my skin felt when using it.
Now Clinique have something called 'anti-age'. An even higher price, and no SPF. Sunscreen was the only effective 'anti aging' ingredient in age defense hydrator. 'Anti-age' offers nothing to justify the price. There are much less expensive and much more effective products on the market. Clinique has lost a customer.
faceoff_negative.headline: No SPF, overpriced junk

rollup.name: Clinique For Men Anti-Aging Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid
